text: Yoram Globus (born 21 October 1943), is an Israeli movie producer. He is most famous for his association with Cannon Films Inc., a company he ran with his cousin Menahem Golan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Israeli businesspeople Category:Israeli Jews Category:Israeli movie producers Category:Jewish businesspeople Category:People from Tiberias
title: Yoram Globus
